item.title: Crossroads of Twilight (The Wheel of Time series, Book 10) by Robert Jordan
item.description: It’s tempting to compare the latest installment of the Wheel of Time series to Seinfeld, the show that professes to be about “nothing”. While doing so would be an exaggeration, it would be fair to say that COT could have done its job in many fewer pages and after much less wait. To be fair, RJ touched on virtually all major characters. To be honest, he didn’t give them anything interesting to do.
